## 지역별 시계열 시각화

```{r}
load("../refinedata/analysis/analysis_total.rda")
library(dplyr)

```


# `최저기온(°C)` 전체

```{r}

analysis_sido_day <- analysis_total  %>% group_by(일시) %>% summarise(`최저기온(°C)` = mean(`최저기온(°C)`,na.rm=TRUE))

ts <- ts(analysis_sido_day[-1]$`최저기온(°C)`,frequency = 365, start = c(2016,1))

fit <- stl(ts, s.window = 'periodic')

par(mfrow=c(1,1))

plot(fit,
     main = '`최저기온(°C)` 전체')



```
